name: @cccode/fxr
description: JavaScript library for editing FXR files from Dark Souls 3, Sekiro, Elden Ring, and Armored Core 6.
author: CCCode

scripts.build: npx tsc && npx terser js/fxr.js -o js/fxr.min.js --ecma 2020 -m "module" -c "keep_fargs,keep_infinity,passes=2,module" --source-map "content='js/fxr.js.map',filename='js/fxr.min.js.map'" && npx cpy js/fxr.d.ts --rename=fxr.min.d.ts --flat js
